requestParams.name: item_list
requestParams.desc: 商品信息,item_id，sku_id,num,price都为必填项 item_message为选填。[{"item_id":"413325328","sku_id":"36203790","num"：“12132414”}]

requestParams.name: order_from
requestParams.desc:
是否来自购物车
如果是来自购物车 填cart
如果非购物车则不需要填写

requestParams.name: order_type
requestParams.desc:
订单类型，0表示普通订单，还有其他类型类似赠品、酒店、拼团等类型
赠品：1
拼团：10
酒店：35

requestParams.name: source
requestParams.desc:
订单来源：购物车，卡门等
购物车：cart
卡门：open

responseParams.name: is_success
responseParams.desc: 操作是否成功，true为成功，false为失败

struct.name: is_success
struct.desc: 操作是否成功，true为成功，false为失败

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['source']="1"
params['order_type']=0
params['order_from']="w"
params['kdt_id']=63077
params['item_list']="[{"goods_id":"321211656","sku_id":"36217407","num":1}]"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.trade.bill.goods.url.get', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'1', 'order_type' => '0', 'order_from' => 'w', 'kdt_id' => '63077', 'item_list' => '[{"goods_id":"321211656","sku_id":"36217407","num":1}]', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

name: get
scenarios: 多商品下单入口，进入结算页
desc: 多商品下单入口，进入结算页
